General.Name: Gear Energy
General.Description: Gear Energy Ltd., an exploration and production company, acquires, develops, and holds interests in petroleum and natural gas properties and assets in Canada. Its properties include the Celtic/Paradise Hill property located approximately 40 kilometers northeast of Lloydminster Alberta; the Wildmere field situated approximately 200 kilometers southeast of Edmonton, Alberta; the Wilson Creek property located in Central Alberta; and the Tableland property situated southwest of Estevan in Southeast Saskatchewan. Gear Energy Ltd. is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 205 ? 5th Avenue S.W., Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 2V7
